tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Visiting a dentist can a be a nightmare for most of us but first of all meeting Dr Arun was a pleasure. He put me at complete ease. His friendly demeanor was quite reassuring. He was gentle and swift so I didn't even feel I was sitting on the dental chair!! 
I would most definitely recommend Dr Arun Swarup to family and friends. In fact I have already informed one friend who is looking for a good dentist.
What also appealed to me was the professionalism when I entered the clinic. I was sanitised after which I was handed a plastic overall and a shower cap to cover my hair. I have visited quite a few dentists and I have not been given this treatment before. This is good idea as it protects our clothes from becoming messy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Dental Examinations,Dental Fillings,
review:
Dr. Arun Swarup is a very senior dentist who has been looking after my dental health for many years. A very straight forward person, with gentle hands and extremely patient. Every procedure is explained explicitly. Strict hygiene is practised and I feel safe at the clinic even during the pandemic. Dr. Arun always personally follows up with his patients after any procedure to check that the patient is doing well. All queries answered patiently and advise given over the phone. I visit both his clinics at Bandra and Andheri. 
He has a multispeciality clinic which offers many treatments. Do visit him. You will not be disappointed...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,Veneers / Laminates,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Swarup since I was a teenager and continue to only trust him with my dental health. Apart from his pleasant personality and sense of humour, he is always very precise with explanation of issues and doesn’t recommend unnecessary procedures. His fillings and other treatments have always lasted really long unlike a few other emergency fillings I had to get done from other doctors which wore off after a couple of years.  
If anyone has any dental issues, he is the only doctor I recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I've been looking for a fantastic dentist in Bandra and I finally found Dr. Arun Swaroop, thanks to a friend's recommendation. His work is extremely meticulous, the advice and explanations crystal clear, the cost of treatment competitive and what I appreciate the most is that he will not recommend dental work on your teeth if he can save your natural healthy teeth for as long as possible. When a dentist cares about your teeth and not what he can bill to you, you know you've hit jackpot! Thank you Dr. Swaroop!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you so much Dr.Arun Swarup for your warmth and lovely nature ! It’s been a wonderful experience meeting you today and thank you so much for putting all my fears of cavity and other other gum bleeding issues to rest ! Your hospitality is endearing and wish you all the best Sir
reply_text: It was a pleasure having you over

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Arun Swarup was our family dentist before we moved to Toronto.  I visited his clinic in Andheri (E)  recently for a  complicated root canal re-treatment.  Dr. Swarup successfully addressed the problem in a few sittings.  I am very pleased with Dr. Swarup's efficiency and expertise and will recommend him to all my friends and acquaintances.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been going to Dr. Arun for many years when it come to any dentistry pain. He is well experienced and he executes the job efficiently . Be it a root canal or fillings. I always receive a call few hours later or may be the next asking if I had had any pain. I have immense confidence in Dr. Arun and would highly recommend his name.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have known Dr. Swarup for more than 15 years.  I am absolutely comfortable with him.  He is an excellent Dentist and always does a good job.  He is able to diagnose the problem well.  I have taken treatment for my tooth in Austria several times with no satisfaction.  I had to make a trip to India and visit Dr.  Swarup.  In his busy schedule, he accomodated me as I had only a few days for treatment.  I returned back fully satisfied.   I would always recommend him to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My experience at Dr Swarup’s clinic  has always been very comfortable . He makes sure his patients are at ease and no matter what the treatment is, or  how scared or nervous the patient is, he makes them  feel relaxed and comfortable .
His friendly nature too distracts the patient( not him for sure) and the treatment is carried out very smoothly without much discomfort and pain.
All in all, I would definitely recommend Dr Swarup to everyone and anyone wanting any good dental treatment .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Swarup is a Goliath in the dental fraternity. His daughter Dr Naina Swarup is equally fabulous. Brilliance runs in this family. Their attention to detail is extraordinary. My dental problems have been resolved and i am deeply grateful to them both..
